note: Artist and author based in the West Midlands of the UK. I make digital paintings of scenic nature, fantasy characters, and closer up subjects like flowers. I have also written and self published 2 sci-fi novels (under my maiden name): https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0CNGV8ZVB (Kindle) https://www.kobo.com/gb/en/series/project-cephalus (Kobo - for epub format.) You can find prints on my INPRNT shop: https://www.inprnt.com/gallery/helenmclaughlinart/ And you can find time lapse process videos of many of my paintings on my Makertube account: https://makertube.net/a/helenmclaughlin/video-channels I am also on Mastodon: https://mastodon.art/@helenmclaughlinart
